alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:48AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Shelby and northeastern Bibb Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 348 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Blocton, or 13 miles west of Montevallo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montevallo, Woodstock, West Blocton, Wilton, University Of Montevallo, North Bibb, Green Pond, Hebron, Dogwood and Marvel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
